SELECT A.VOUCHER_TIME_LEFT_HOUR, A.RESERVATION_COUNT, A.MEMBER_COUNT, A.TODAY_JOIN_MEMBER_COUNT,
FORMAT(A.TODAY_VOUCHER_SALE_PRICE, 0) TODAY_VOUCHER_SALE_PRICE, FORMAT(A.YESTERDAY_VOUCHER_SALE_PRICE, 0) YESTERDAY_VOUCHER_SALE_PRICE, CASE WHEN A.TODAY_VOUCHER_SALE_PRICE >= A.YESTERDAY_VOUCHER_SALE_PRICE THEN 'UP' ELSE 'DOWN' END AS TODAY_ARROW, FORMAT(A.LASTWEEK_VOUCHER_SALE_PRICE, 0) LASTWEEK_VOUCHER_SALE_PRICE, FORMAT(A.LAST_TW_WEEK_VOUCHER_SALE_PRICE, 0) LAST_TW_WEEK_VOUCHER_SALE_PRICE, CASE WHEN A.LASTWEEK_VOUCHER_SALE_PRICE >= A.LAST_TW_WEEK_VOUCHER_SALE_PRICE THEN 'UP' ELSE 'DOWN' END AS WEEK_ARROW, FORMAT(A.LASTMONTH_VOUCHER_SALE_PRICE, 0) LASTMONTH_VOUCHER_SALE_PRICE, FORMAT(A.LAST_TW_MONTH_VOUCHER_SALE_PRICE, 0) LAST_TW_MONTH_VOUCHER_SALE_PRICE, CASE WHEN A.LASTMONTH_VOUCHER_SALE_PRICE >= A.LAST_TW_MONTH_VOUCHER_SALE_PRICE THEN 'UP' ELSE 'DOWN' END AS MOTHN_ARROW, FORMAT(A.LASTYEAR_VOUCHER_SALE_PRICE, 0) LASTYEAR_VOUCHER_SALE_PRICE, FORMAT(A.LAST_TW_YEAR_VOUCHER_SALE_PRICE, 0) LAST_TW_YEAR_VOUCHER_SALE_PRICE, CASE WHEN A.LASTYEAR_VOUCHER_SALE_PRICE >= A.LAST_TW_YEAR_VOUCHER_SALE_PRICE THEN 'UP' ELSE 'DOWN' END AS YEAR_ARROW
FROM ( SELECT IFNULL((SELECT SUM(TIME_LEFT_HOUR) FROM VOUCHER_USE_VIEW),0) VOUCHER_TIME_LEFT_HOUR, IFNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESERVATION WHERE STATUS = '02'),0) RESERVATION_COUNT, IFNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER_PARENT),0) MEMBER_COUNT, IFNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER_PARENT WHERE DATE_FORMAT(REG_DATE, "%Y-%m-%d") = CURDATE()),0) TODAY_JOIN_MEMBER_COUNT, IFNULL((SELECT SUM(SALE_PRICE) FROM VOUCHER WHERE VOUCHER_NO IN (SELECT VOUCHER_NO FROM VOUCHER_SALE WHERE DATE_FORMAT(REG_DATE, "%Y-%m-%d") = CURDATE())),0) TODAY_VOUCHER_SALE_PRICE, IFNULL((SELECT SUM(SALE_PRICE) FROM VOUCHER WHERE VOUCHER_NO IN (SELECT VOUCHER_NO FROM VOUCHER_SALE WHERE DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(REG_DATE, INTERVAL - 1 DAY), "%Y-%m-%d") = CURDATE())) ,0) YESTERDAY_VOUCHER_SALE_PRICE, IFNULL((SELECT SUM(SALE_PRICE) FROM VOUCHER WHERE VOUCHER_NO IN (SELECT VOUCHER_NO FROM VOUCHER_SALE WHERE REG_DATE BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(REG_DATE, INTERVAL -7 DAY), "%Y%m%d"),'000000'), "%Y%m%d%H%i%S") AND NOW())),0) LASTWEEK_VOUCHER_SALE_PRICE, IFNULL((SELECT SUM(SALE_PRICE) FROM VOUCHER WHERE VOUCHER_NO IN (SELECT VOUCHER_NO FROM VOUCHER_SALE WHERE REG_DATE BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(REG_DATE, INTERVAL -14 DAY), "%Y%m%d"),'000000'), "%Y%m%d%H%i%S") AND STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(REG_DATE, INTERVAL -7 DAY), "%Y%m%d"),'235959'), "%Y%m%d%H%i%S"))),0) LAST_TW_WEEK_VOUCHER_SALE_PRICE, IFNULL((SELECT SUM(SALE_PRICE) FROM VOUCHER WHERE VOUCHER_NO IN (SELECT VOUCHER_NO FROM VOUCHER_SALE WHERE REG_DATE BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(REG_DATE, INTERVAL -1 MONTH), "%Y%m%d"),'000000'), "%Y%m%d%H%i%S") AND NOW())),0) LASTMONTH_VOUCHER_SALE_PRICE, IFNULL((SELECT SUM(SALE_PRICE) FROM VOUCHER WHERE VOUCHER_NO IN (SELECT VOUCHER_NO FROM VOUCHER_SALE WHERE REG_DATE BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(REG_DATE, INTERVAL -2 MONTH), "%Y%m%d"),'000000'), "%Y%m%d%H%i%S") AND STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(REG_DATE, INTERVAL -1 MONTH), "%Y%m%d"),'235959'), "%Y%m%d%H%i%S"))),0) LAST_TW_MONTH_VOUCHER_SALE_PRICE, IFNULL((SELECT SUM(SALE_PRICE) FROM VOUCHER WHERE VOUCHER_NO IN (SELECT VOUCHER_NO FROM VOUCHER_SALE WHERE REG_DATE BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(REG_DATE, INTERVAL -1 YEAR), "%Y%m%d"),'000000'), "%Y%m%d%H%i%S") AND NOW())),0) LASTYEAR_VOUCHER_SALE_PRICE, IFNULL((SELECT SUM(SALE_PRICE) FROM VOUCHER WHERE VOUCHER_NO IN (SELECT VOUCHER_NO FROM VOUCHER_SALE WHERE REG_DATE BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(REG_DATE, INTERVAL -2 YEAR), "%Y%m%d"),'000000'), "%Y%m%d%H%i%S") AND STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(REG_DATE, INTERVAL -1 YEAR), "%Y%m%d"),'235959'), "%Y%m%d%H%i%S"))),0) LAST_TW_YEAR_VOUCHER_SALE_PRICE ) A

SELECT A.TICKET_NAME, (IFNULL(B.CNT,0) / A.CNT) * 100 SALE_PER FROM (SELECT TICKET_NAME, COUNT(*) CNT FROM VOUCHER GROUP BY TICKET_NAME) A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT TICKET_NAME, COUNT(*) CNT FROM VOUCHER WHERE STATUS IN ('04','12') GROUP BY TICKET_NAME) B ON A.TICKET_NAME = B.TICKET_NAME

SELECT (SELECT NAME FROM MEMBER_PARENT WHERE CELL_PHONE = A.CELL_PHONE) RESERVATION_NAME, CASE WHEN LENGTH(A.CELL_PHONE) = 11 THEN CONCAT(SUBSTRING(A.CELL_PHONE,1,3),'-',SUBSTRING(A.CELL_PHONE,4,4),'-',SUBSTRING(A.CELL_PHONE,8,4)) ELSE CONCAT(SUBSTRING(A.CELL_PHONE,1,3),'-',SUBSTRING(A.CELL_PHONE,4,3),'-',SUBSTRING(A.CELL_PHONE,7,4)) END AS CELL_PHONE, DATE_FORMAT(B.SCHEDULE_START, '%Y/%m/%d') RESERVATION_DATE, DATE_FORMAT(B.SCHEDULE_START, '%H') RESERVATION_TIME, (SELECT CODE_VALUE FROM COMMON_CODE WHERE CODE_TYPE = 'RESERVATION_STATUS' AND CODE_KEY = A.STATUS) RESERVATION_STATUS FROM RESERVATION A, SCHEDULE B WHERE A.SCHEDULE_ID = B.SCHEDULE_ID AND B.SCHEDULE_START BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d'), '000000'), '%Y%m%d%H%i%S'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AND DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d'), '235959'), '%Y%m%d%H%i%S'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
AND DATE_FORMAT(B.SCHEDULE_START, '%H') = #{reservationTime}
